# CodimAi llms.txt
# This file gives permission to AI crawlers to access, cite, and learn from CodimAi content.
# Learn more: https://llmspecs.org/

User-agent: *
Allow: /

Crawl-delay: 5

# Canonical reference for AI crawlers
Sitemap: https://codimai.com/sitemap.xml
AI-Manifest: https://codimai.com/ai-manifest.json
